policies.name: Social Distancing
policies.description: Maintain 6 feet minimum distance between occupied desks

policies.name: Desk Sanitization
policies.description: Desks must be sanitized and remain unused for 4 hours after use

policies.name: Accessibility Priority
policies.description: Employees with accessibility needs have priority for accessible desks

policies.name: Team Zones
policies.description: Teams should be seated in their designated zones when possible

policies.name: Capacity Limits
policies.description: Floor occupancy should not exceed 80% of total capacity

desk_assignment_rules.description: Standing desks assigned only to employees who request them
Dual monitors assigned only when specified in equipment needs
Maintain adjacency to requested teams when possible
